summary: Behold the return of our favorite dark elf, Valen Dreth. But this time, he has returned as a sacrificial pig to Boethia.
descriptionHtml:
Big drag to have someone who trusts your Dragonborn with their whole heart and soul be sacrificed to the Daedric Lord Boethia? 

Say no more! 

[img]http://images1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120513135548/elderscrolls/images/e/e3/ValenDreth.png[/img]

Our favorite Dunmer, asshole dickwad extraordinaire, Valen Dreth! --is back! Waiting for that special someone to plunge that rusted blade of Sacrifice through his flesh in honor of his Daedric lord. 

And don\'t bother having him as a follower for I have configured him to have the worst possible AI I could brew up in the Creation kit. He\'ll be waiting for you at the Sacellum of Boethia.

So want that Ebony Mail without the drag and guilt? Download now and it will be a knife-thrust away! You\'ll be so glad for the first time to sacrifice someone to Boethia--- with a PASSION
author: Braigus09
